links.*: The Return of the King (1980 film)

wikitext.*:
'''Theodore Isidore Gottlieb''' ([[1906]]-[[2001]]), mostly known as '''Brother Theodore''', was an American actor and comedian. He was the voice for [[Gollum]] in [[The Hobbit (1977 film)]] and [[The Return of the King (1980 film)]] animated films.
